author: asanso
msg: SLING-2593 - Improvement for the Sling performance tools. Adding module to pom.xml

author: asanso
msg: SLING-2593 - Improvement for the Sling performance tools. Adding first part of the patch provided from Christian Vazzolla:  Created a new maven project that contains only the sling performance tests and left the framework(tool) related part in the base project as we would like to use the framework for performance testing in other projects also. Thanks Christian!

author: markt
msg: Use CharBuffer rather than StringBuilder to build the access log message to:
- save a char[] to String conversion and the associated garbage
- allow buffers to be recycled also saving garbage
Reduces allocations due to the AccessLog from 43% to 27% of the overall allocations
